What if a 🐘, who was so celebrated that it became a wizard, was impressed by a 🐛 who was so fervent that it became an acolyte?
The 🐛 had always cut an impressive figure. #Wizard=#Acolyte
🐘😧👍🐛 (or: 🐘 was impressed by 🐛) So at first, the fervent 🐛 made a tremendous impression on the celebrated 🐘.
🐛💂📄❓🐘📝 (or: 🐘 recruited 🐛) So the 🐘 recruited the 🐛 into its ranks.
🐘🚶🚶🏿🐛 (or: 🐘 was escorted by 🐛) Well, the 🐛 escorted the 🐘 everywhere.
🐘😤😩👉🐛 (or: 🐘 was frustrated by 🐛) But the 🐛 was a constant source of frustration to the 🐘.
🐘😄😏👉🐛 (or: 🐘 condescended to 🐛) So the 🐘 snootily condescended to the 🐛.
🐘🎓🤓🐛☝😌💬 (or: 🐘 was lectured by 🐛) Well, the 🐛 gave the 🐘 a paternalistic talk.
🐘😪🐛 (or: 🐘 was bored by 🐛) "What a bore!" thought the 🐘 of the 🐛.

What if a 🐭, who was so powerless that it became a lapdog, was supervised by a 🐍 who was so charismatic that it became a ringleader?
If anyone was in need of supervision it was the 🐭. #Lapdog=#Ringleader
🐍👁🔛🐭 (or: 🐭 was supervised by 🐍) So at first, the charismatic 🐍 supervised the powerless 🐭's every activity.
🐍💃📸🐭📸💃🏿📸🏆 (or: 🐍 was upstaged by 🐭) But the 🐭 took the spotlight away from the 🐍.
🐭😥🐍 (or: 🐭 disappointed 🐍) Then the 🐍 considered the 🐭 to be a big disappointment.
🐭😖👈😄🐍 (or: 🐭 was denounced by 🐍) So the 🐍 launched a public denunciation of the 🐭.
🐭💥🐍💢 (or: 🐭 attacked 🐍) Well, the 🐭 pounced on the 🐍. 🐍1⃣🆚0⃣🐭 (or: 🐭 was defeated by 🐍) But the 🐍 walked all over the 🐭.
🐭😠😐✌✌😐😠🐍 (or: 🐭 settled with 🐍) So the 🐭 reached a settlement with the 🐍.
🐍🛐🙏💭🐭 (or: 🐍 preached to 🐭) But the 🐍 delivered a lengthy sermon to the 🐭.
🐭😖👈😄🐍 (or: 🐭 was humiliated by 🐍) In the end, the charismatic 🐍 excoriated the powerless 🐭 with a humiliating lecture.
Will the 🐍 be satisfied with merely humiliating the 🐭? or will the 🐍 want to use the ultimate sanction? The End
